normalised: Okay, here's the normalized version of your blog post draft:

unnormalised: **Spilling the Chai: Your Dose of Bollywood Buzz!**
normalised: **Spilling the Chai: Your Dose of Bollywood Buzz!**

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Grab your chai and samosas, 'cause we're about to dive into the juiciest gossip fresher than a batch of hot jalebis.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Grab your chai and samosas, because we're about to dive into the juiciest gossip fresher than a batch of hot jalebis.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Alia and Ranbir's alleged house hunting trip to Bandra. Sources say they were spotted checking out a sprawling sea-facing apartment, possibly bigger than the Kapoor family's ancestral home. Are they planning to upgrade after baby Raha? Only time will tell! But imagine the Diwali parties there!

Only time will tell! But imagine the Diwali parties there!

unnormalised: Next, remember that viral video of Ranveer tripping over his dhoti at the Filmfare Awards? Well, apparently, Deepika was NOT amused. Sources close to the couple claim there was a slight "tiff" backstage. Someone get Ranveer some stronger safety pins, stat!

unnormalised: And speaking of awards, rumour has it that Karan Johar is already planning the next season of Koffee with Karan, and is desperately trying to get Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas as his first guests. Can you imagine the tea they would spill? Ratings gold, I tell you!

unnormalised: On a different note, word on the street is that Jahnvi Kapoor is prepping hard for her role as a South Indian bride in her next film. She's even been taking dance lessons to perfect her Bharatanatyam moves! Maybe we'll see her celebrating Onam on set!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Kartik Aaryan was recently seen grabbing a plate of chicken biryani at Hyderabad's famous Paradise Restaurant. Apparently, he ordered a double portion! Method acting for his next food-related role, perhaps? He even apparently walked 2 kms to avoid getting mobbed by fans - dedication!

unnormalised: Finally, remember that rumour about Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal renewing their vows at the Golden Temple? Well, apparently, it was just a rumour! But sources *did* confirm they celebrated their anniversary with a private dinner at a fancy restaurant in Mumbai. Very hush-hush!
